title: Fix admin email/password login by hardcoding first admin credentials and removing broken token bootstrap UI

requirements.text: Update the backend admin credentials to match the provided first admin account so that email/password login succeeds immediately: set `adminEmail` to `fitting.point.official@gmail.com` and `adminPassword` to `Farhan@456`, and ensure `authenticateAdminWithEmailPassword(email, password)` grants the caller the `#admin` role when those credentials match.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend `adminEmail` equals `fitting.point.official@gmail.com` and `adminPassword` equals `Farhan@456` after deployment.

Calling `authenticateAdminWithEmailPassword("fitting.point.official@gmail.com","Farhan@456")` succeeds and assigns the caller admin role (so subsequent `isCallerAdmin()` returns `true` for that caller).

Calling `authenticateAdminWithEmailPassword` with an incorrect email and/or password traps with an error message that the frontend classifies as invalid credentials (e.g., includes "Authentication failed" or similar).

requirements.text: In the admin login screen UI, remove or disable the token-based "First-Time Setup" / "Grant Admin Access" bootstrap section since it is currently failing and the intended flow is direct email + password login; keep the email/password login form as the only admin access path presented to users.

quotes: And the **Grant Admin Access** form is also failing because the tokens no longer match the updated version of the app after removing Internet Identity.
No tokens. No Internet Identity. No bootstrap. Just straight email + password.

acceptanceCriteria: On the /admin login screen, users no longer see inputs/buttons for "Admin Token", "User Token", or "Grant Admin Access".
The email/password login form remains visible and functional, and on success navigates to the admin dashboard (existing behavior in `AdminLayout.tsx`).

constraints: Backend changes must remain within the existing single-actor Motoko architecture (`backend/main.mo`).
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or any files in `frontend/src/components/ui` (immutable paths).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing a multi-admin management system (create/delete multiple admins).
Adding password reset, email verification, or any external authentication provider.
